text: This is a website which sells a wide variety of t-shirts. The website is run by a company called Splunk T-Shirt Co. The main problem I had with this website is the website is very slow. It took over an hour to load the first time I tried it. It took another hour to load the second time. I was unable to make any purchases and was unable to navigate the website at all.
The website also had problems with their credit card processing. I had issues with the website being down for a couple of days. I had to email them several times in order to get their website
I tried to submit a review for a t-shirt I bought and it is taking forever to load.
I tried to submit a review for a t-shirt I bought and it is taking forever to load.
Why can't I submit reviews anymore? Something seems broken.
I can't submit a review from my iPad.
The response time for submitting a review seems very slow.
I can't find my review.
I can't find my review in my account.
I tried to submit a review to a product that I bought on another website and it said that the t-shirt was out of stock. I couldn't find the product.
I can't find my review.
I tried to submit a review and it said it worked but I can't find my review.
Why can't I see my reviews after submitting them?
Why did my review disappear?
This is a terrible website.
This is a joke, right? If so, it's not a very good one.
I was not able to find my review. It is taking forever to load.
Is anyone able to see this review? wtf.
I submitted a review about a different t-shirt and it says not found.
There is no Add to cart button for products in the My Products page.
I'm not seeing any of my My Orders from the My Account page.
I wanted to submit a review for a t-shirt I bought and it's taking forever to load.
The review submission page is broken.
Is anyone else having issues submitting reviews?
I've never even heard of Splunk until today. I want to submit a review for a t-shirt I bought. It took forever to load. It is probably taking longer because it is a slow day for Splunk.
Why is it so hard to submit a review for a product? I'd like to buy more t-shirts, but I can't submit reviews.
I can't submit reviews anymore.
I used to be able to submit reviews and they would go through. Then, all of a sudden, it stopped.
I can't find a way to submit reviews.
I can't find any way to contact Splunk Customer Support.
I've been trying to submit reviews for the past couple of days, but it just keeps coming back with the error message: The website could not be reached.
I have an older review that I'd like to remove from the site, but when I click on the Delete this review link it says You cannot delete this review at this time.
If anyone can help me with either of these problems, I'd really appreciate it.
I'm having an issue where I'm getting a 404 error page when I go to a page that should be available for logged in users
I'm getting this issue only now, and I've noticed that other users are getting the same problem.
When I go to the main page, I get the 404 error page.
I've tried twice now and both times it is giving me a Connection to server timed out. I have the same problem every time I try to submit a review.
I was trying to submit my review using the Submit a Review link on the right side of the page. When I did that, the site did not give me an error message but it didn't submit my review either.
When I tried to submit a review, it said it was submitted and that I should check my spam folder.
I have tried the review link at the bottom of the page, the review link is broken.
When I tried to submit my review, the website said An error occurred while trying to submit your review.
The review text box is too small to hold my review.
The website has poor navigation.
The website looks ugly.
The website's design is confusing.
The website takes a long time to load.
I cannot find a way to see my ratings and reviews.
I cannot find a way to contact the owner of the website.
I can only see the reviews of other people.
I cannot log in to my account.
I cannot post a review.
I cannot edit my review.
I would rate this website zero stars if I could.
The website is so horrible that it was necessary to write this review. I'm going to list my issues with the website and the company and then I'm going to give my opinion on the horrible t-shirts.
I would not recommend this website to anyone.
I would not recommend this website to anyone.
I would not go back to this website for any reason.
I tried to review the site twice, but I got this error message: Unfortunately, something went wrong with the review you attempted to submit. Please try again, or contact us if you need assistance.
The web-site is not responsive.
I tried to review the site on my phone, but the web-site was not responsive. The page is too small for my phone. I have to scroll to read the reviews.
The reviews on the site are not sorted in any order.
I never thought I would have to write a bad review about a how writing a review doesn't work and yet here we are.
I was able to submit a review, but it was rejected by the website for reasons unknown.
Just stop trying and go to a better website. I hope this helps other people who are having trouble writing reviews on Splunk T-Shirt Co.
I think they are deleting bad reviews so the average rating stays high.
I have been a happy customer for a long time, but recently they have not been honoring my returns, and I am considering dropping them.
Splunk T-Shirt Co does not give the shirt to the reviewer (only reviewers who have an average rating of 4 or more)
The website, Splunk T-Shirt Co, does not disclose what criteria they use to determine whether or not a review should be deleted.
I think they should have put a warning about the 100% Cotton claim. I don’t know if I can wear cotton in the winter.
The shipping was slow
The website had a terrible design
The t-shirt was not what I expected
The t-shirt was damaged
The t-shirt didn't fit me correctly
I was disappointed with the quality
The product was not worth the price
I was going to order a Splunk t-shirt as a gift for a co-worker, but I changed my mind at the last minute. So I decided to order a cheap t-shirt from a well known t-shirt website instead.
The small print on the back is very small and hard to read.
The shirt has a very small tear on the left side
The sizing is poor.
When I ordered the shirt, I got a medium. It is not true to size and the medium does not fit well. It is too short for my husband’s height (6ft 1) and too long for me.
The printing is not very good.
The Splunk logo is very blurry. The text is too small.
The Splunk logo is very small. I’m surprised that it took Splunk to make this design.
The design is poor.
The design is terrible. It does not look professional

The size chart provided on the website is confusing and misleading. The small size is the same as the medium and the large is the same as the extra large. The shirt fits me well, but it is not a good idea to order the large based on the measurements of a medium.
The shirt arrived in a damaged condition. There was a hole in the back of the shirt, as shown in the following picture.
The shirt was not properly washed before it was shipped.
The shirt was damp and smelly when I received it.
The front of the shirt was not finished. The following picture shows how the front of the shirt looks like.
The logo was poorly placed and the shirt was too small.
The shirt was not well-made. The shirt was cut off at the bottom. It had a very bad fit. The printing was off-centered.
The shirt was too tight. It was too tight on the chest area and it was too loose around the waist. The top was not fitted properly and it did not have enough length in the sleeves.
The shirt was not pre-shrunk. The shirt shrunk too much for me to fit.
The shirt is not well made. I was extremely disappointed to see that the material is not thick enough to be comfortable to wear. The shirt feels thin and cheap.
The design is not well done. I don't think the designer of the shirt was very good at graphic design.
The design is not well thought out. There are several design flaws that I can easily see when looking at the picture of the shirt.
The design does not make sense. The design is very confusing and does not make any sense.
The design is very poorly done
The t-shirt was nothing special.
The t-shirt did not come with a man-sized drawstring.
The t-shirt was not the color I ordered. It was light blue
The small t-shirt did not fit me. I am a 44-46 waist and a 38-40 chest.
No matter how hard I try, my review never loads.
It is a shirt.
More like t-sh!t, amirite?
Friggen can't submit a review this is broken
trash
My review is completely wrong. I am extremely dissatisfied.
Why do they have such bad customer service?
Why can't I see more reviews?
I want to see other negative reviews. I was even about to call customer support when I saw another review.
How come the review was not deleted?
My review is just a blank.
I can't even read my own review.
I get an error message when I submit a review
I tried to update my review but it keeps giving me an error
When I hit submit on my review it just loads and loads
I should be able to review EVERYTHING on the website that I bought and in fact, I've previously bought 4-5 times the same tee shirt. does-not-meet expectations.
I tried to delete a review but my entire account got deleted instead. That is blessing if you ask me. I never have to deal with this again.
I clicked the icon that said More Reviews... Only now I am on the website. And I still can't seem to find my review.
Is that my review? I guess I'd better read it, but it is so negative that I am doubtful.

Note that this website is encouraging others to view what others are saying, and even post their own review about a product. Was I deliberately denied this review, so as to make them look bad? Why won't my review load?
Why don't they give me a choice to review a product either on behalf of my own personal or someone else's profile?
I am looking for a t-shirt for a grown man.
I have to say I really dislike the fact that the t-shirt design is not centered in the front.
